param.name: template
param.label: Initialize the visualizer or pick a template
param.option: Find all GWAS variants of a gene that are located in enhancers and identify the associated genes of these enhancers
For a set of co-expressed genes, what transcription factors appear to be controlling their coordinated expression
Find all promoters and super enhancers associated with genes in a particular biological pathway

tool.help:
**What does this tool do?**
**Services/Inputs**
1, Natural Language
2, Use a visualizer to build a query or select from templates https://goeckslab.github.io/Galaxy-ML/APIs/keras-galaxy-models/#kerasgbatchclassifier
3, JSON file
**Output** JSON format
.. class:: infomark **TIP:** **Steps to Initialize the visualizer**
**Step 1** Choose the Query BUilder as a service
**Step 2** Choose the Initialize the Visualizer option
**Step 3** Then run the tool, this will load a JSON file into the history which you can use in the query builder
**Step 4** Choose the visualize option on the history
**Step 5** And open the visualizer with the name QB
This will start the visualizer which you can use to build queries which will run it in this tool and give you the output
